workflow_runs.name: Deploy GitHub Pages
workflow_runs.display_title: Fix npm publish: remove problematic scripts + ultra-minimal workflow

head_commit.message:
Fix npm publish: remove problematic scripts + ultra-minimal workflow

- Remove prepare/postinstall scripts that cause CI failures
- Use direct publish from npm-wrapper (ships pre-built lib/)
- No dependency install needed in CI since lib/ is committed

repository.name: contextlite
repository.description: ContextLite is a Go-based context assembly engine that uses **Satisfiability Modulo Theories (SMT)** optimization to select the perfect set of documents for AI context windows. Built for speed, privacy, and local operation.

workflow_runs.name: Release
workflow_runs.display_title: MISSION ACCOMPLISHED: Complete IP protection implementation

head_commit.message:
MISSION ACCOMPLISHED: Complete IP protection implementation

 CRITICAL SECURITY VULNERABILITY RESOLVED
 All package distributions sanitized (Docker, npm, VS Code, GitHub)
 Complete git history scrubbed (202 commits, 1,019 objects changed)
 Zero SMT methodology accessible through any public channel
 Competitive IP theft threat eliminated

Ready to resume deployment pipeline work with full IP protection.
